name: Default Quotes
description: Motivational and inspirational quotes included in Mue.
author: The Mue Authors

quotes.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The key responsibility of leadership is to think about the future.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news, is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.quote: Hard times don't create heroes. It is during the hard times when the 'hero' within us is revealed.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: Step by step the thing is done.
quotes.author: Charles Atlas

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: The hard days are what make you stronger.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.occupation: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

quotes.quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Success doesn't come to you; you go to it.
quotes.author: T. Scott McLeod

quotes.quote: If it scares you, it might be a good thing to try.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: What's on the other side of fear? Nothing.
quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: With the right kind of coaching and determination you can accomplish anything.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: Those who can't change their minds, can't change anything.
quotes.author: George Shaw

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.
quotes.author: Jim Hensen

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: The best project you'll ever work on is you.
quotes.author: Sonny Franco

quotes.quote: It seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: If you can tune into your purpose and really align with it, setting goals so that your vision is an expression of that purpose, then life flows much more easily.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: The true success is the person who invented himself.
quotes.author: Al Goldstein

quotes.quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quotes.author: Martonek Jr

quotes.quote: You can find a better you inside of you. Why don't you search for that?
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.occupation: Founding Father of the United States

quotes.quote: Time goes on. So whatever you're going to do, do it. Do it now. Don't wait.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
quotes.author: Grace Coddington

quotes.quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: If you don't like how things are, change it!
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The control center of your life is your attitude.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E Cummings

quotes.quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: A will finds a way.
quotes.author: Orison Marden

quotes.quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.quote: All we can do is the best we can do.
quotes.author: David Axelrod
quotes.occupation: Former Senior Advisor to the President of the United States

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
quotes.author: Phillip Sidney

quotes.quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Motivation comes from working on things we care about.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: Hope never abandons you, you abandon it.
quotes.author: George Weinberg

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: If the plan doesn't work, change the plan, but never the goal.
If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Give up on being perfect and start working on becoming yourself.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Be a voice not an echo.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I never lose. Either I win or learn.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You gotta water your plants. Nobody can water them for you.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.quote: Work hard, be kind and amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Make the most of yourself...for that is all there is of you
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Some people look for a beautiful place. Others make a place beautiful.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
Never regret anything that made you smile.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Go the extra mile. It's never crowded there.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: If you don't have a competitive advantage, don't compete.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Work until your rivals become idols.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Accomplishing the impossible is all about seeing the invisible.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Impossible is just an opinion.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.occupation: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: You are the only one who can limit your greatness
If you believe it will work out, you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't, you will see obstacles.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.occupation: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney
